thread.title: Amazing stay. Made me feel like home!!
thread.title_full: Amazing stay. Made me feel like home!! - Review of Terrass'' Hotel by MH, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Nikola H
title: Amazing stay. Made me feel like home!!
text: Amazing hotel and incredible service. Views from the restaurants are amazing. Food taste incredible. Both dinner and breakfast are one of the best I ever had in Parisians hotels. Well recommend. Staff goes above and beyond to make you feel like home. Absolutely in love with the hotel, location and services received there! Well recommended. Will be back soon!
